import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";

import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Find a Conference Token by ID"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/conference_tokens/{id}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Find a conference token by ID.

#### Permissions
The API token must include the following scopes: _Video_.


<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"id","in":"path","description":"Unique ID of the Conference Token","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"OK","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"id":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Unique ID of the Conference Token"},"name":{"type":"string","description":"Name of the Conference Token","example":"My First Token"},"token":{"type":"string","description":"Conference Token's randomly generated sequence","example":"vpt_62c65414de4d067d07415a7ced8183be"},"scopes":{"type":"array","description":"List of permissions","items":{"type":"string","example":"room.member.audio_mute"}}}}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
